description: A lawless junk heap on the outskirts of the Goa Kingdom where poor and disadvantaged people search through garbage for valuables. It serves as a base for pirates and outcasts, including young Ace, Sabo, and Luffy.

keyEvents.title: Naguri's Roger Flashback
keyEvents.description: At Gray Terminal, Naguri shares his flashback about his past encounter with Gol D. Roger, revealing Roger's merciful nature.
keyEvents.significance: Provides historical context about Roger's character and establishes Naguri's connection to the Pirate King.

keyEvents.title: Ace vs Naguri Duel
keyEvents.description: Ace challenges Naguri to a duel at Gray Terminal, resulting in Ace's defeat and the three brothers becoming Naguri's apprentices.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the mentor-student relationship that will help the brothers grow stronger.

keyEvents.title: Building Naguri's Pirate Ship
keyEvents.description: The three brothers help Naguri construct a pirate ship at Gray Terminal, learning practical skills while training.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the brothers' dedication to becoming pirates and their willingness to learn.

keyEvents.title: Tiger Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: The three brothers challenge the fearsome tiger at Gray Terminal, beginning their coordinated team attack.
keyEvents.significance: Tests the brothers' teamwork and combat abilities.

keyEvents.title: Combination Attack on Tiger
keyEvents.description: At Gray Terminal, the brothers execute their coordinated attack using Luffy's rubber slingshot to launch Ace at the tiger.
keyEvents.significance: First major display of the three brothers working together in combat using combination tactics.

keyEvents.title: Tiger Defeated
keyEvents.description: The tiger is defeated through the combined efforts of all three brothers at Gray Terminal.
keyEvents.significance: Represents their growth and the power of their teamwork.

keyEvents.title: Naguri Sets Sail
keyEvents.description: Naguri departs from Gray Terminal on his newly completed pirate ship, saying goodbye to the three brothers.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the brothers' training period with Naguri.

keyEvents.title: Bluejam Locates Sabo
keyEvents.description: At Gray Terminal, Bluejam orders his crew to inform Sabo's father that they've found him.
keyEvents.significance: Foreshadows the coming crisis involving Sabo's noble family and the Gray Terminal fire.

statusHistory.reason: Gray Terminal serves as the brothers' base and training ground during this arc
